titles.title: Preserving the MotorCities Heritage Act
Preserving the MotorCities Heritage Act
A bill to extend the authorization for the MotorCities National Heritage Area in the State of Michigan, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Preserving the MotorCities Heritage Act
This bill extends through FY2025 the authority of the Department of the Interior to make grants or furnish technical assistance for the MotorCities National Heritage Area in Michigan.
The bill also increases the maximum amount of funding that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
